content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see my apartment in Munich. I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you to ensure that we both get what we want. So, what rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am a student and I need to be responsible with my finances. My landlord, I want to be on good terms with him. I understand that there might be some expenses that I have to pay on top of the rental price, but I am willing to discuss those later. For now, I am only interested in the rental price. What are you offering?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for clarifying your expectations, Hassan. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. Based on its size and location, I was thinking of offering a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Of course, I am open to discussing any potential concessions or additional expenses that may be necessary. What are your thoughts on this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. I understand that there might be additional expenses like utilities, but I am willing to discuss those later. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, Hassan. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price.
